title: Calendrical Calculations
text: goal calcal calendrical calculations, based algorithms described Reingold Dershowitz (2018) Calendrical Calculations, 4th edition, Cambridge University Press.

title: Calendrical Calculations
text: can install development version calcal GitHub :

title: Calendrical Calculations
text: Dates multiple calendars: US holidays Christian holidays

title: Christian Ecclesiastical Holidays — advent
text: Functions return Gregorian dates various Christian ecclesiastical holidays special days

title: Christian Ecclesiastical Holidays — advent
code: advent(year)  christmas(year)  orthodox_christmas(year)  epiphany(year)  easter(year)  orthodox_easter(year)  alt_orthodox_easter(year)  pentecost(year)

title: Christian Ecclesiastical Holidays — advent
text: year Gregorian year

title: Christian Ecclesiastical Holidays — advent
code: tibble::tibble(   year = 2025:2030,   advent = advent(year),   christmas = christmas(year),   orthodox_christmas = orthodox_christmas(year),   epiphany = epiphany(year),   easter = easter(year),   orthodox_easter = orthodox_easter(year),   alt_orthodox_easter = alt_orthodox_easter(year),   pentecost = pentecost(year) ) #> # A tibble: 6 × 9 #>    year     advent  christmas orthodox_christmas   epiphany     easter #>   <int>      <Gre>      <Gre>              <Gre>      <Gre>      <Gre> #> 1  2025 2025-11-30 2025-12-25         2025-01-07 2025-01-05 2025-04-20 #> 2  2026 2026-11-29 2026-12-25         2026-01-07 2026-01-04 2026-04-05 #> 3  2027 2027-11-28 2027-12-25         2027-01-07 2027-01-03 2027-03-28 #> 4  2028 2028-12-03 2028-12-25         2028-01-07 2028-01-02 2028-04-16 #> 5  2029 2029-12-02 2029-12-25         2029-01-07 2029-01-07 2029-04-01 #> 6  2030 2030-12-01 2030-12-25         2030-01-07 2030-01-06 2030-04-21 #> # ℹ 3 more variables: orthodox_easter <Gre>, alt_orthodox_easter <Gre>, #> #   pentecost <Gre>

title: Lunar phase at date — lunar_phase
text: Lunar phase date, angle degrees. angle 0 means new moon, 90 degrees means first quarter, 180 means full moon, 270 degrees means last quarter.

title: Lunar phase at date — lunar_phase
text: date Date vector location Location object ... Additional arguments
